author: fioriNTU
body:
This PR fixes a crash in the Strip Online client, it is a temporary fix. 
The crash is due to this PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21355 not being merged before this one https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21656 (i.e Online and Offline code are not syncronized).
title: temporary fix for MWGR18
